title: John Leonard
text: John Leonard is Professor of Computer Science at the Virginia Commonwealth University. Dr. Leonard is a data engineer and architect with interests in data pipelines and automation. His teaching covers the full stack of the data lifecycle, from databases and SQL to middleware and APIs to front end development for web and mobile platforms. Dr. Leonard write applications in FORTRAN, C, C++, MATLAB, Javascript, SQL, R and Python.

title: John Leonard
text:
